description:
The beautiful and lethal Seleção Kuroha enters the picture. Meanwhile, the actions of two wildly different men - a stranger on the street and the Prime Minister of Japan - prove the extent of Takizawa’s influence.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est pas le moment de penser à ça !
Ima Sonna Koto Kangaeteru Baai ja Nai no ni
This Is No Time to Be Thinking About That...
今そんなこと考えてる場合じゃないのに
